capabilityDescription.en: Sends the contents to a specified Amazon Kinesis Firehose. In order to send data to firehose, the firehose delivery stream name has to be specified.
capabilityDescription.zh: 将内容发送到指定的Amazon Kinesis Firehose。为了向消防水带发送数据，必须指定消防水带输送流名称。

en.displayName: Amazon Kinesis Firehose Delivery Stream Name
en.description: The name of kinesis firehose delivery stream

zh.description: kinsis消防水带输送流的名称
zh.displayName: 亚马逊Kinesis消防水带交付流名称

en.description: Specifies the Proxy Configuration Controller Service to proxy network requests.

zh.description: Specifies the Proxy Configuration Controller Service to proxy network requests.

en.description: Endpoint URL to use instead of the AWS default including scheme, host, port, and path. The AWS libraries select an endpoint URL based on the AWS region, but this property overrides the selected endpoint URL, allowing use with other S3-compatible endpoints.

zh.description: 要使用的端点URL，而不是AWS默认值，包括方案、主机、端口和路径。AWS库根据AWS区域选择一个端点URL，但此属性覆盖所选的端点URL，允许与其他S3兼容的端点一起使用。

en.description: The Controller Service that is used to obtain AWS credentials provider

zh.description: The Controller Service that is used to obtain AWS credentials provider

failure.en: FlowFiles are routed to failure relationship

success.en: FlowFiles are routed to success relationship

aws.kinesis.firehose.error.code.en: Error code for the message when posting to AWS Kinesis Firehose
aws.kinesis.firehose.error.code.zh: 向AWS Kinesis Firehose发布消息时的错误代码

aws.kinesis.firehose.error.message.en: Error message on posting message to AWS Kinesis Firehose
aws.kinesis.firehose.error.message.zh: 向AWS Kinesis Firehose发布消息时出现错误消息

aws.kinesis.firehose.record.id.en: Record id of the message posted to Kinesis Firehose
aws.kinesis.firehose.record.id.zh: 发布到Kinesis Firehose的消息的记录id
